titleInfo.title: Letter, J.G.M. Ramsey in Riverside, Tenn., to William and Henry Lenoir in Lenoirs, Tenn. 1871 Dec. 25

mods.abstract: J. G. M. Ramsey wrote to his grandsons, William and Henry Lenoir, on Dec. 25, 1871. He wished them a Merry Christmas and expressed his wish to see them. He gave them advice on how they should conduct themselves. He praised them for their accomplishments in their education. He mentioned that William being the oldest should watch over younger brother Henry. He asked them to respect people, especially women. He mentioned the women in their family as being well-bred, especially their deceased mother.
